oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Station Inn: True Life Bluegrass - 2004-06-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview and discussion with makers of the documentary film titled Station Inn: True Life Bluegrass from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 27, 2004.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Patrick Isbey; Nathan Shuppert;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Discussion and interview moderated by Jay Orr following screening of the film documentary. Includes questions from the audience. Subjects include: inspiration for the film -- film history -- choice to include complete performances and expenses -- using color and black and white for performances -- sync rights issues -- filming issues -- response from fans -- contribution from Mike Bub -- future projects -- segment with James Monroe -- inability to acquire key interviews -- Paul Kingsbury's contributions -- comments on the Steve Earle and Del McCoury segment.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Isbey, Patrick; Shuppert, Nathan; Station Inn (Nashville, Tenn.); Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
